plot: "This picture goes to prove that kisses are all right in their way; but should not be bestowed on a girl when she has an armful of dishes. The kiss is given, but the dishes are broken."
title: A Time and a Place for Everything
plot_es: "This picture goes to prove that kisses are all right in their way; but should not be bestowed on a girl when she has an armful of dishes. The kiss is given, but the dishes are broken."
